examples.example: 在领导的带领下，我们的团队取得了辉煌的成绩。

translate.english: Under the leadership of the leader, our team has achieved brilliant results.

examples.example: 多亏了领导的英明决策和悉心指导，我们才能够顺利地完成这个项目。

translate.english: Thanks to the wise decision and careful guidance of the leader, we were able to successfully complete this project.

examples.example: 领导一直鼓励大家积极创新，使得整个团队充满了活力和创造力。

translate.english: The leader has always encouraged everyone to innovate actively, making the whole team full of vitality and creativity.
